plot: Jorge Guimaraes changed houses, job and town in a bid to forget the one who left him. Three months later, all he had was a wait without hope, flies and heat. He ended up killing to kill time. He became known as The Serial Killer.
title: O Serial Killer
plot_es: Jorge Guimaraes changed houses, job and town in a bid to forget the one who left him. Three months later, all he had was a wait without hope, flies and heat. He ended up killing to kill time. He became known as The Serial Killer.

produce.name: Instituto do Cinema, Audiovisual e Multimédia (ICAM)
